title: BRAIN TRAINER
description: Acvtivate your brain cells and get ready! A new 'Brain Trainer' has arrived! No matter if you keep your brain fit, improve your performance or just having fun to train your personal cognitive abilities, this game is for you! Just because you are no longer in school, does not mean that you can't sharpen your mind. Solve a great variety of individual mini-games. If you get stuck, just swap light bulbs against hints. Convinced? Then dive in and test yourself! Are you made for this?
